channel.title: [508]bulby/tokkul-scape based, training melee is messed, training att,def,str?
channel.description:
when i use a dragon scimitar (4587) it has the options of chop,slash,smash,block.
when i train with d scim and put on chop. its suppose to train attack but it gives str exp. when i train with d scim and put on slash. its suppose to train strength but it gives defence exp. when i train with d scim and put on smash. its suppose to train shared but it gives defence exp. when i train with d scim and put on block. its suppose to train defence but it gives shared exp. could someone guide me to where i can fix this problem?
